statements: SELECT * FROM sales_payment_methods;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount FROM sales_payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, payment_method, order_date FROM sales_payment_methods WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount FROM sales_payment_methods ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, order_date FROM sales_payment_methods WHERE payment_method LIKE 'Credit%';
SELECT * FROM sales_payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC, amount ASC
SELECT payment_method, amount FROM sales_payment_methods WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' AND order_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT payment_method, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM sales_payment_methods GROUP BY payment_method HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM sales_payment_methods GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_amount > 500 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS total_customers, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM sales_payment_methods WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM payment_methods;
SELECT payment_method FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_method, payment_id FROM payment_methods ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM sales_transactions WHERE payment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods ORDER BY payment_method DESC;
SELECT payment_method FROM payment_methods WHERE payment_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM sales_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT payment_method, amount FROM payment_methods JOIN sales_transactions ON payment_methods.payment_id = sales_transactions.payment_id;

SELECT payment_method, amount, transaction_date FROM payment_methods JOIN sales_transactions ON payment_methods.payment_id = sales_transactions.payment_id WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT payment_method, amount FROM payments JOIN orders ON payments.payment_id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount, payment_date FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method, amount FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_id > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM popular_payment_methods;
SELECT payment_id, payment_method FROM popular_payment_methods ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM product_sales GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT payment_method, total_sales FROM popular_payment_methods WHERE total_sales > 10000 ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT transaction_id, sale_amount, sale_date FROM sales_transactions JOIN popular_payment_methods ON sales_transactions.payment_id = popular_payment_methods.payment_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_amount DESC;

SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity_sold, SUM(sale_amount) AS total_sales_amount FROM products JOIN product_sales ON products.product_id = product_sales.product_id GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity_sold > 10;
